title: Having Your Welsh Cake and Eating It (with Ben Lake MP)
itunes:title: Having Your Welsh Cake and Eating It (with Ben Lake MP)
description:
MP Ben Lake clarifies that Plaid Cymru wants to reap the benefits of Brexit but tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker the party wouldn't rule out an independent Wales re-joining the EU. And Roger Awan-Scully, professor of politics and international relations at Cardiff University discusses Boris Johnson's weak negotiating position as the government lays out plans to control fishing rights in British waters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
